function.name: powerSwitch_turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on the power of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to have its power turned on.

groupAction.description: The group action for the SmartThings device that needs to have its power turned on.
